title: Pottery ladies. Part 1
creator_credit: Jenny Wilkes, Elizabeth Taylor-Mead and Arts Council of Great Britain
brief_description: Joan Jackson (Rhead’s biographer), Gordon Elliot (ceramic historian), Barry Leigh (manufacturer) and the women employed in the manufacturing process of Rhead’s work discuss and trace the history, influences and production techniques of Charlotte Rhead’s work.
